metadata.title: CVE-2024-25446 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the HuginBase::PTools::setDestImage function of Hugin v2022.0.0allows attackers to cause a heap buffer overflow via parsing a craftedimage.

criterions.comment: hugin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
